meanings.definition: The quality or state of being protrusive.
meanings.sent1: Her protrusivenesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The protrusivenesses of the tree branches created a unique silhouette against the sky.
meanings.sent3: The protrusivenesses of the clown's nose made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The protrusivenesses of the mountain peaks reached towards the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The protrusivenesses of the lizard's tongue catching a fly was fascinating to watch.

meanings.definition: The act of protruding or thrusting forward.
meanings.sent1: The sudden protrusivenesses of the turtle's head surprised us.
meanings.sent2: The protrusivenesses of the rocket's boosters signaled the start of the launch.
meanings.sent3: The protrusivenesses of the toast popping out of the toaster made her jump.
meanings.sent4: The protrusivenesses of the shark's fin cutting through the water was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The protrusivenesses of the flower buds bursting open in spring brought joy to all.
